title: Advanced Immunology and Diseases of Animals
description: In-depth analysis of the immune system, including molecular basis for immunity of domesticated animals. Application of immunological assays, and application of scientific method to examine immunity and disease in domesticated animals. Not open to students with credit in ASCIÂ 440. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: ASCI 229; ASCI 320 or CHEM 371 or equivalent; STAT 218 or equivalent; or consent of instructor
